text:
Behind every stylish woman is the ultimate capsule wardrobe. Some of our greatest style inspirations, such as the Duchess of Sussex, Hailey Bieber and Rosie Huntington-Whiteley rarely set a fashion foot wrong, as they know the power of investing in the right pieces.

Take Meghan, she's known for her classic aesthetic and timeless approach to fashion that doesn't adhere to passing trends – instead, she invests in hero pieces like the everyday white shirt and a chic pair of wide-leg trousers. The same goes for Bieber and Huntington-Whiteley, both know the importance of developing your own uniform and investing in classic fashion pieces that truly stand the test of time. We can learn so much from these stylish women when it comes to shopping for our own wardrobes. From the classic trench to the crisp white shirt, the LBD to the trouser suit, this list is the ultimate capsule wardrobe for any fashion lover.

Not only is building a capsule wardrobe a guaranteed way to always look chic, but it also means we are consuming fashion in a more conscious way and therefore having less of an impact on the planet. If you're having a wardrobe refresh to make way for these classic pieces, follow our tips on how to effectively resell your wardrobe and advice on how to detox your space, from saying goodbye to certain items to the best ways to organise your clothes.

Once you've had your wardrobe refresh, it's time to invest in the pieces you'll wear forever – below we outline the 15 pieces classic fashion pieces every woman should own.
